name: Ahmed Ali
text: ALIF LAM RA. These are the verses of the Book and the perspicuous oration.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The unbelievers would haply like to wish that they had submitted (and become Muslim).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Leave them to feast and revel, beguiled by hope; they will come to know soon.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Not one habitation have We destroyed but at the time determined for it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: No people can hasten or delay the term already fixed for them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And yet they say: "You, to whom this Exposition has been sent are surely possessed of the Devil.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: If you are a man of truth, why can't you bring the angels to us?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But then We never send the angels down save with the purpose (of enforcing their doom), after which they will not be given more respite.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have sent down this Exposition, and We will guard it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We had also sent apostles to people of earlier persuasions.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But never once an apostle came to them at whom they did not scoff.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We place in the hearts of sinners (disbelief).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So, they will not believe in it: The example of former people is there.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Even if We open a door in the heavens and they ascend through it in broad daylight,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will say all the same: "Our eyes were dazed (and clouded over). We were a people ensorcelled."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have placed the signs of the Zodiac in the sky, and decked it out for those who can see;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We have preserved it from every accursed devil,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except the ones who listen on the sly, yet they are chased away by a shooting flame.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We stretched the earth and placed upon it firm stabilisers, and made all things grow upon it balanced evenly.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have provided on it sustenance for you, and for those you cannot provide.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Of all things there are We have the stores, and send them down in determined measure.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We send rain-impregnated winds, and water from the sky which you drink, but you are not the keepers of its store.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It is We who give life and We who give death, and We are the One who will abide.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We surely know those of you who go forward and those of you who lag behind.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Your Lord will surely gather them together: Certainly He is all-wise and all-knowing.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Man We fashioned from fermented clay dried tingling hard,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: As We fashioned jinns before from intense radiated heat.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But when your Lord said to the angels: "I am verily going to create a human being from fermented clay dried tingling hard;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And when I have fashioned him and breathed into him of My spirit, bow before him in homage;"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The angels bowed in homage in a body

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except Iblis. He refused to bow with the adorers.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "How is it, O Iblis," said (the Lord), "you did not join those who bowed in homage?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "How could I bow," said he, "before a mortal whom You created from fermented clay dried tingling hard?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Go hence, execrable," (said the Lord), "from this place,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Condemned till the day of Doom!"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "O my Lord," said he, "give me respite till the day the dead are raised."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "You are among the reprieved," (said the Lord),

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Till the predetermined time."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "O my Lord," he said, "since You have led me into error I'll beguile them with the pleasures of the world and lead them astray,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except the chosen ones among Your creatures."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (To which God) said: "This way is right by Me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: No power shall you have over (all) My creatures except those who fall into error and follow you,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: For whom the ordained place is surely Hell,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Which has several gates, and each gate is marked for every section of them."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily those who keep away from evil and follow the straight path shall be in the midst of gardens and springs of water.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Enter in peace and tranquility," (they will be told).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We shall cast out any grudge they may have in their hearts. (There) they will sit on couches face to face like brothers together.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: No weariness will come upon them, nor will they be sent away from there.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Announce to My creatures that I am indeed forgiving and kind,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But My punishment is surely a painful one.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Inform them about the matter of Abraham's guests.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When they came to him and said: "Peace," he answered: "Truly we are afraid of you."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Have no fear," they said. "We bring you news of a son full of wisdom."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "You bring me the good news now," he said, "when old age has come upon me. What good news are you giving me then?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "We have given you the happy tidings of a truth," they replied. "So do not be one of those who despair."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Who would despair of the mercy of his Lord," he answered, "but those who go astray."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And asked them: "What matter, O angels, brings you here?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "We have been sent," they said, "to (punish) a sinful people,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Except the family of Lot whom we shall save

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Other than his wife who, it is decreed, will remain with those who will stay behind."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When the messengers came to the family of Lot,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "You are people I do not know."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "We have come to you with news," they said, "of what your people doubt;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Yet we bring to you the truth, and we are truthful.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "So leave with your family late in the night, yourself remaining in the rear, and let none turn back to look, and go where you will be commanded."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We issued this command to him, for they were going to be destroyed in the morning.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then came the people of the city, exulting at the news.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Said Lot: "These are my guests; do not put me to shame,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "And do not disgrace me. Have some fear of God."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Did we not restrain you," they said, "from (entertaining) creatures from the outside world?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Here are my daughters," said Lot, "if you are so active."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily by your life they were utterly confused in their (lustful) drunkenness.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So they were seized by the mighty blast at break of day;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We turned the city upside down, and rained on them stones of hardened lava.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Herein are really signs for those who discern.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This (city) lies on a road that still survives.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Indeed there is a portent in this for those who believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The dwellers of the Wood (near Midian) were also wicked.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We punished them too. They are both situated by the highway, clearly visible.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The people of Al-Hijr denied Our apostles;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And though We had given them Our signs they turned away from them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They used to hew dwellings in the mountains to live in security.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But they were seized by the mighty blast towards the morning;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And all that they had done (for security) availed them nothing.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have not created but with reason the heavens and the earth and all that lies within them. The Hour (of the great change) is certain to come. So turn away (from them) with a grace.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Surely your Lord is the Creator and knows (everything).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have indeed given you the seven oft-repeated (examples), and the majestic Qur'an.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So covet not things We have bestowed on a portion of them to enjoy, and do not grieve for them, and protect those who believe;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And say: "I am a distinct warner,"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Like (those) We had sent to those schismatics who slandered their Books

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And severed their Scripture into fragments.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: By your Lord We shall question them one and all

name: Ahmed Ali
text: About their deeds.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So declare to them what We have enjoined, and turn away from idolaters.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We are surely sufficient to deal with those who scoff at you,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Who place other gods besides God. They will come to know soon.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We are well aware that you are disheartened by what they say.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But you should glorify your Lord with praises, and be among those who bow in submission;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And go on worshipping your Lord till the certainty (of death) comes upon you.
